examples.korean: I panicked, I cried—the whole ball of wax. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 겁을 집어 먹고 울부짖고, 온통 난리였지 뭐. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She’ll throw a fit if she finds out. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 알게 되면 한바탕 성질을 부릴[난리를 피울] 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She’ll throw a fit if she finds out. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It was bedlam at our house on the morning of the wedding. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 결혼식 날 아침 우리 집에서는 완전 난리였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was bedlam at our house on the morning of the wedding. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We’ve got enough problems without you trying to stir things up. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신이 난리 안 피워도 우린 충분히 문제가 많아. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We’ve got enough problems without you trying to stir things up. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Steve kicks up a fuss every time I even suggest seeing you. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 스티브는 내가 너를 만나겠다는 이야기만 꺼내도 매번 난리를 부려. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
